t: AMAZON PACKAGE AND ORDER TRACKING
s: After Amazon picks, packs and ships your order, you will be provided with a unique identifier assigned to each shipped package. As the parcel passes through destinations, this ID is scanned and reported back to you, giving you a detailed real-time look into where your items are at all times.
